name: Filipino Machine Weft Hair Extensions (Straight,Slight Wave ,Wavy)
description: Please email me for Availability Before Ordering Myfilipinohair@gmail.com Filipino hair surpasses the standards of all hair on the market today. Filipino hair is dense and thicker and than any other hair on the Market, Brazilian hair, Indian and even Malaysian hair. Thus being able to withstand color, heat, and manipulation without jeopardizing quality. Our Filipino hair has been hand selected and collected from Manila, Philippines. MyFilipino Hair only carries 100% Virgin Filipino hair collected from donors age 18-40. Our hair goes through a serious of quality control test before meeting you the consumer! NO CHEMICALS! Only heat steam is used to produce the Body wave and curly patterns. MyFilipino hair holds a curl like a dream. Whether curled or set with rollers. Our hair works best with little to no product and does not tangle. Our hair is thick from root to tip and is true to length or longer and is often an inch or more longer. Bundle Weight: Standard weight 3.5oz or it can be customized to your weight of choice Note: For 24‚Äù and up availability of stocks must be confirmed. Texture Grade: Silky, Slight Coarse, Coarse and Very Coarse **Texture grade, and luster can be requested but are not guaranteed. Color: Dark Brown to off Black **Texture grade, and luster can be requested but are not guaranteed. Length: Each length ranges 10"-30"inches Single drawn are for Straight, Slight wavy and wavy Ends: Our Filipino hair has full ends and are thick Styling: 10-18" 2 bundles needed for full weave, 20-24" we suggest 3 bundles, 24-30" you'll need 3-5 bundles Filipino hair holds a curl like a dream. Whether curled or set with rollers. Our hair works best with little to no product and does not tangle. Our hair is thick from root to tip and is true to length and often an inch or two longer. *No two bundles will ever be the same some hair will differ in texture in the Slight Wavy and Wavy Preview of Textures Straight Texture Slight Wavy Texture Wavy Texture Delivery to your Door 6-10 days with processing and shipping depending on your location

name: Filipino Hand Tied Weft Extensions (Straight,Slight Wavy, Wavy)
description:
Our hand-tied weft  is made of Virgin Filipino
human hair.  It is smaller and thinner, No shedding or
tangling.


What are hand tied wefts?
Our hand tied weft is made of virgin Filipino human hair manually woven into the weave and custom attention is given.  They are
excellent for sew in weaves.  



What is the advantage of hand tied weft vs. machine weft?
Compared to machine weft, hand tied weft is thinner
and more flexible.  Hand tied wefts lay flat against your scalp to give a more natural look.  In machine weft, shedding is sometimes a problem if  wefts are cut. But in hand tied wefts there is almost no shedding.

What volume or density (volume) is our hand tied weft?
We made it sure that the hand tied weft is flat and
thinner than the machine weft.  Our standard is light density but at
client's option, we can customize the density to a thicker one.



 

What to avoid?


In all hand tied weft, never cut the weft. 
Hand Tied wefts are made in a 8 to 10" wide per line so that you may or your stylist can easily attach the weft.


What are clients options on our Filipino hair?
Since authentic Filipino hair textures and styles
vary, client may have these options:

Texture:  Silky, slightly coarse and
coarse
Style: straight, slightly wavy, wavy,
deep wave and curly


AVAILABLE LENGHTS
CHECK FOR Availability ON LENGHTS 24" & up
SLIGHT WAVY 16-24 LENGHTS GO UP TO 30" 
WAVY 18-24 GO UP TO 30"
CURLY 16,18 ONLY
BODY WAVE AND BIGWAVE 16,18,20 ONLY

name: Filipino Body Wave/ Loose Wave
description: FILIPINO BODY WAVE Our machine weft is hygienically processes using virgin human hair and the latest technology. These are tangle free. This machine weft is produced using virgin Filipino human hair. No chemical is used to maintain the strength and attractive appearance. This is wavy in style and suited in both slightly coarse, coarse and silky hair. Options: Texture: Silky, Slight Coarse and Coarse Closures Are Sold Separately -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- FILIPINO LOOSE CURL MACHINE WEFT - Loose Wave Our Loose Wave Filipino hair is beyond beautiful and the weft are hygienically processed using virgin human hair and is cuticle aligned The Hair is tangle free. No chemical is used to maintain the strength and attractive appearance. This is wavy in style and suited in both slightly coarse, coarse and silky hair. Texture: Silky, Slight Coarse and Coarse

name: Filipino Curly
description: Our Filipino Curly hair has been steam processed from Virgin Filipino hair to achieve the gorgeous and bouncy curls. This hair is very easy to maintain and is able to achieve a wash and go look. Filipino curly hair can be straightened for a sleek look. When washed the hair will return to its beautiful curl pattern. This hair ranges from natural brown to natural black. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. Pictures Spring Curly Aloha Curly Big Curl Please Email to Check availability myfilipinohair@gmail.com Please note that there will be a 15 day processing time on this hair if not in stock.

name: Filipino Lace/Silk Closures
description: MyFilipino Hair would like to offer our available closures made of Swiss and Silk Base Lace. The hair we used is 100% human hair from the Philippines. The hairs we use are cuticle align known as Remy hair. It has never been chemically treated in any way. Our Swiss Lace Closure is constructed in a very unique way, where in we distribute the hair evenly in some area and made the other parts thinner than the other areas. The lace looks like scalp, so it is not detectable. It looks and feels more natural. Please see specifications below for our Lace Closures: Size 3" x 4.5". Silk Base Closure 3"x4" The knots are visible in Swiss closure but can be bleached Base Color: Skin Tone and Medium Brown Density: Medium Density Pictures Lace Closure Top View Bottom view Silk Base Closure Top View Bottom View We also Carry Frontals And Injection Closures This closure provides the most realistic scalp the market has to offer. It gives the illusion that the hair is actually growing out of your scalp. The hair we used is 100% human hair from the Philippines. The hair textures vary from silky to slight coarse and coarse. The closure‚Äôs size is available in 3‚Äùx4‚Äù. myFilipinohair closure hair pieces are easy to maintain and style and can be parted in any direction. These pieces will give you the crown confidence you've been looking for! Customizable: Size, Base Color Email Myfilipinohair@gmail.com to inquire
